title: League of Legends client wonÂ´t open and patch
body:
Hi,I am having an issue for 3 days now that my league client wont launch and if it does it just stops patching the newest patch and starts to show errors.
Pls can somebody help me ?{{item:3151}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: What errors are you seeing?  When exactly is it happening?  Let me know, and I can try and help!
